member.name: T:Primavera.Lithium.ChatGPT.Server.Common.Configuration.CorsOptionsBase
member.summary: Defines the base class for the type that provides configuration options used for CORS.

member.name: P:Primavera.Lithium.ChatGPT.Server.Common.Configuration.CorsOptionsBase.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the CORS middleware should be enabled.
member.remarks: If false, the middleware will not be configured and all other options will be ignored. If true, the middleware will be configured and allowed origins, headers, etc. will be added according to the other configuration options.

member.name: P:Primavera.Lithium.ChatGPT.Server.Common.Configuration.CorsOptionsBase.AllowedOrigins
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed origins.
member.remarks: You may specify multiple origins, separated by ;. If the value is null or whitespace, no origins will be added. It is not possible to allow all origins.

member.name: P:Primavera.Lithium.ChatGPT.Server.Common.Configuration.CorsOptionsBase.AllowedMethods
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed methods.
member.remarks: You may specify multiple methods, separated by ;. If the value is null or whitespace ALL methods will be allowed.

member.name: P:Primavera.Lithium.ChatGPT.Server.Common.Configuration.CorsOptionsBase.AllowedHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed headers.
member.remarks: You may specify multiple headers, separated by ;. If the value is null or whitespace ALL headers will be allowed.

member.name: M:Primavera.Lithium.ChatGPT.Server.Common.Configuration.CorsOptionsBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Sets the default values.
member.remarks: This method should be overridden to set the default values of properties.
